backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a chat backend with Message type, conversation history storage, and sendMessage/getConversationHistory endpoints; AI response generation is a stub that traps.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used by shadcn/ui components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app at #root and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders ChatInterface as the sole view.
frontend/src/components/ChatInput.tsx: Auto-resizing textarea input component with Enter-to-send, Shift+Enter for newline, and a neon-styled send button that disables while awaiting a response.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Main chat layout composing the header with avatar and clear button, scrollable message list, typing indicator, empty-state prompt suggestions, and the input bar.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with user bubbles right-aligned and AI bubbles left-aligned, including timestamps formatted from nanosecond bigint values.
Animated three-dot typing indicator with AI avatar shown while waiting for an AI response.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches a backend actor instance, using an authenticated identity when available or falling back to anonymous, and invalidates dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Custom hook managing chat state with optimistic user message insertion, send/clear actions, and typing indicator derived from mutation pending state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication hook and provider that manages AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, delegation validity checks, and exposes identity and status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching conversation history, sending messages, and clearing local conversation cache via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for a dark futuristic theme, and adds neon glow utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with Space Grotesk/Mono fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, neon glow box shadows, and custom border radius values, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features, pending feature requests, and a known issue where the AI echoes user input instead of generating real responses.
